title: Intensive Short-Term Course for Enhancing English Speaking Competency for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in elementary English grammar and vocabulary knowledge
context.additional_context: Structure optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, combining offline sessions three times a week with mobile learning content

learning_goals: Fluently construct three or more English sentences in daily work situations
Capable of delivering presentations utilizing five or more professional terms in simulated work meetings
Submit weekly English speaking practice and recording assignments via mobile app at least five times per week

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
